roles.title: In-house Doctor
roles.description: In-house doctor has access to the entire system.

data.title: Appointment Provider Selection
data.description: Allow the user to schedule appointments for all providers in the practice group

data.title: Access To Message Center
data.description: Allow the user to access the message center

data.title: Create And Update Contacts
data.description: Allow the user to create, update and remove contacts

data.title: Provider Dropdown
data.description: Allow the user to dropdown of provider switch (Practice Groups Only)

data.title: View Practice Group
data.description: Allow the user to view practice group information

data.title: Settings
data.description: Allow the user to view and edit doctor's profile

data.title: Manage Permissions
data.description: Allow the user to manage permission of their doctors and staff

data.title: Manage Accounts
data.description: Allow the user to create new or edit existing staff member accounts

data.title: Add New Referring Sources
data.description: Allow the user to add new referring sources on the patients demographics screen

data.title: Access All Messages For Practice Group
data.description: Allow the user to view and interact with the messages for their whole practice group

data.title: Access Scheduling
data.description: Allow the user to view, add, and edit patient appointments and other scheduling features

data.title: Emergency Access
data.description: Allow the user to temporarily request emergency access to Create and Update Patients, Access Scheduling and Access Clinical Notes system permissions

data.title: Access Clinical Notes
data.description: Allow the user to view and interact with the clinical notes components

data.title: Sign/Lock Clinical Notes
data.description: Allow the user to sign in and lock clinical notes

data.title: Manage Templates
data.description: Allow the user to create new or edit existing clinical templates

data.title: Use IPad EHR
data.description: Allow the user to access the iPad EHR system

data.title: Create And Update Patients
data.description: Allow the user to create and update patient information

data.title: Access Patient Analytics
data.description: Allow the user to access and interact with patient analytics

data.title: Share Patients
data.description: Allow the user to access all patients in a practice group

data.title: Access Reports
data.description: Allow the user to access and interact with reports

data.title: Export Patients
data.description: Allow the user to use user export tools

data.title: Access Billing
data.description: Allow the user to view and interact with the billing system

data.title: Show Patient Balance
data.description: Allow the user to view the patients balance in the appointment screen and patient screen

data.title: Show Billing Tab
data.description: Allow the user to view and edit information in the billing tab in the appointment view

data.title: Show Billing Summary
data.description: Allow the user to view and edit information in the billing summary screen

data.title: Access Institutional Billing
data.description: Allow the user to view and interact with the institutional claims

data.title: Billing Administrator
data.description: Allow the user to manage sensitive billing data

data.title: Access Balance/Ledger
data.description: Allow the user to view balance/ledger screen in the billing center

data.title: Access Patient Payments
data.description: Allow the user to view patient payments screen in the billing center

data.title: Access Patient Statements
data.description: Allow the user to view patient statements screen in the billing center

data.title: Drug Interactions Check
data.description: Allow the user to perform drug interaction checks

data.title: Show Patient Balance
data.description: Allow the user to access eRx screens
